creator.organizationName: Dipartimento di Scienze della Natura e del Territorio, Università di Sassari

address.deliveryPoint: Dipartimento di Scienze della Natura e del Territorio, Università di Sassari, Via Piandanna 4, I-07100 Sassari, Italy

abstract.para: The databases stores historical and current plant occurrence records relative to Sardinia administrative region of Italy (NUTS-2 code ITG2). Source of records may be bibliographical references, herbarium specimens, or human observations. The database is associated with the Wikiplantbase project, including sister databases for Tuscany, Liguria and Sicily

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY-NC) 4.0 License.
